div.div: Please visit our COVID-19 page to see updated information on coursework expectations and resources.
div.a: Read More about Coursework Expectations and Resources

div.div: Please take notice that the BOARD OF EDUCATION OF THE ARGYLE CENTRAL SCHOOL DISTRICT will hold a special meeting of members of the Boards of Education on Tuesday, April 21, 2020 @ 5:00 PM, REMOTELY THROUGH ELECTRONIC MEANS DUE TO THE COVID-19 GATHERING RESTRICTIONS.
div.a: Read More about April 21, 2020 Virtual BOE Meeting

div.div: Please read the following information on Academic Material pick-up for April 16, 2020...
div.a: Read More about 4.16.20 Update on Collecting Academic Materials

a.title: Mr. Garrison Uses 3D Printer For The Better Good!

div.a: Mr. Garrison Uses 3D Printer For The Better Good!
div.div: Technology teacher Gregory Garrison is using his at-home 3D printer to manufacture face shields, with the intent to donate to those in need; community members, Argyle Fire Department, EMS, and more.
div.a: Read More about Mr. Garrison Uses 3D Printer For The Better Good!

a.title: Extended Closure and Cancellation of Regents Exams

div.a: Extended Closure and Cancellation of Regents Exams
div.div: I am writing to provide you with additional updates regarding the new extended school closure, regents exams cancellation, and more.
div.a: Read More about Extended Closure and Cancellation of Regents Exams

div.div: Please take notice that the BOARD OF EDUCATION OF THE ARGYLE CENTRAL SCHOOL DISTRICT will hold its monthly meeting of members of the Boards of Education on Thursday, April 9, 2020 at 7:00pm , REMOTELY THROUGH ELECTRONIC MEANS DUE TO THE COVID-19 GATHERING RESTRICTIONS.
div.a: Read More about April 9, 2020 Virtual BOE Meeting

p.span: It is the mission of Argyle Central School to provide a program which will enable its students to acquire the skills, knowledge, and values necessary to become responsible citizens. In a positive atmosphere conducive to creative and critical thinking, each student is provided with sound educational experiences which will foster the development of a strong moral character and self-concept.
